metadata.title: CVE-2020-28595 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the Obj.cpp load_obj() functionality of Prusa Research PrusaSlicer 2.2.0 and Master (commit 4b040b856). A specially crafted obj file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
